title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 2 Sean Salisbury
itunes:title: 03/19/21 DPS Hour 2 Sean Salisbury
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Dan dissects Michigan State men’s basketball head coach Tom Izzo’s physical and verbal confrontation with Spartan Gabe Brown prior to halftime of the NCAA Tournament play-in game between Michigan State and UCLA. Also, Sean Salisbury, host of The Sean Salisbury Show on Sportstalk 790 in Houston, stops by to chat about all things current in the NFL--including the sexual misconduct allegations surrounding Houston Texan quarterback Deshaun Watson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
